name: Strelitzia nicolai
info: Also known as the Bird of paradise, this plant prefers moist soil, humid environment, and can tolerate direct sun to low light conditions

name: Chamaedorea seifrizii
info: Also known as the Bamboo palm, this plant grows best in bright, indirect sunlight and moist soil

name: Monstera deliciosa
info: Mostly called by the name Monstera, this plant likes bright, indirect sunlight. This plant prefers to have its soil dry out slightly in between waterings

name: Alocasia Frydek
info: Also called the Green Velvet Alocasia, this plant requires watering when the top soil is dry, and bright indirect sunlight.

name: Pilea Peperomioides
info: Also known as the Chinese Money Plant, this plant ejoys deep weekly waterings and bright, indirect sunlight but can adapt to lower light levels.

name: Epipremnum aureum
info: Also known as the Devil's Ivy, this plant prefers its soil to be kept moist and can tolerate low light conditions

name: Hypoestes phyllostachya
info: Also called the Polka-dot plant, this plant prefers its soil to be kept moist and bright,indirect light.

name: Calathea ornata
info: Also known as the Pinstripe plant, this plant does best with bright, indirect sunlight, moist soil, and a humid environment.

name: Calathea lancifolia
info: Also known as the Rattlesnake plant, this must be in slightly moist soil at all times and tolerates indirect sunlight best.

name: Dracaena trifasciata
info: Also called the Snake plant, this plant seems happiest in bright light or partial shade, and only watered after soil is completely dry.

name: Zamioculcas zamiifolia
info: Also known as the ZZ plant, this plant grows well in low levels of light and water after soil has completely dried.

name: Senecio rowleyanus
info: Also called the String of Pearls plant, this plant enjoys slightly moist soil and direct to indirect sunlight.

name: Monstera Adansonii
info: Also known as the Swiss Cheese plant, this plant prefers bright, indirect light and water every 1-2 weeks.

name: Scindapsus pictus
info: Sometimes called the Satin Pothos, this plant doesn't mind slightly dry soil and low light settings.

name: Ficus lyrata
info: Also called the Fiddle Leaf Fig plant, this plant prefers bright direct/indirect sunlight and water every 1-2 weeks.

name: Peperomia Obtusifolia
info: Also known as the Baby Rubber Plant, this plant prefers bright indirect to low light conditions and water every 1-2 weeks.

name: Maranta Leuconeura var. Erythroneura
info: Also known as the Lemon Lime prayer plant, this plant enjoys moist but not soggy soil and indirect sunlight.

name: Maranta leuconeura
info: Also called the prayer plant or praying hands, this plant enjoys moist but not soggy soil and indirect sunlight.

name: Peperomia argyreia
info: Also known as the Watermelon Peperomia, this plant prefers bright to medium indirect sunlight, humid environment, and watering when top soil is dry.

name: Pachinra aquatica
info: Also known as the Mondey Tree plant, this plant prefers low to bright indirect light and moist soil.
